fill="currentcolor"></path></svg></span><span class="cdc-svg-icon-text">举报</span></span></div></div></div><div><div class="mod-header__special"><div class="cdc-special-guide"><span><i class="cdc-special-guide-icon"></i>文章被收录于专栏：</span><a class="cdc-special-guide-name">恩蓝脚本</a></div></div></div>
</div><div class="mod-content"><div class="mod-content__markdown"><div><div class="rno-markdown new-version rno-"><p>用基于浏览器(webdriver)的selenium技术爬取数据，所以程序需运行在GUI环境下。本文分三个部分简要介绍安装GUI界面及远程连接的步骤。</p><p><strong>安装GUI界面</strong></p><p>大多数<a class="rno-markdown__textlink-new" 
href="https://cloud.tencent.com/act/pro/promotion-cvm?from_column=20065&amp;from=20065" target="_blank" style="color:#0052d9">云服务器</a>厂商提供的镜像都无GUI界面，所以要先安装图形环境。本文使用<span class="mod-overview__keyword">GNOME</span>桌面环境：</p><div class="rno-markdown-code"><div class="rno-markdown-code-toolbar"><div 
class="rno-markdown-code-toolbar-info"><div class="rno-markdown-code-toolbar-item is-type"><span class="is-m-hidden">代码语言：</span>javascript</div></div><div class="rno-markdown-code-toolbar-opt"><div class="rno-markdown-code-toolbar-copy"><i class="icon-copy"></i><span class="is-m-hidden">复制</span>
</div></div></div><div class="developer-code-block"><pre class="prism-token token line-numbers language-javascript" tabindex="0" style="font-family:Consolas,Monaco,&quot"><code class="language-javascript" style="margin-left:0">yum <span class="token operator">-</span>y groups install <span 
class="token string">"GNOME Desktop"</span><span aria-hidden="true" class="line-numbers-rows"><span></span></span></code></pre></div></div><p>这条命令将安装GNOME桌面的必要软件包，执行完后配置X系统使用GNOME:</p><div class="rno-markdown-code"><div class="rno-markdown-code-toolbar"><div class="rno-markdown-code-toolbar-info">
<div class="rno-markdown-code-toolbar-item is-type"><span class="is-m-hidden">代码语言：</span>javascript</div></div><div class="rno-markdown-code-toolbar-opt"><div class="rno-markdown-code-toolbar-copy"><i class="icon-copy"></i><span class="is-m-hidden">复制</span></div></div></div><div 
class="developer-code-block"><pre class="prism-token token line-numbers language-javascript" tabindex="0" style="font-family:Consolas,Monaco,&quot"><code class="language-javascript" style="margin-left:0">echo <span class="token string">"exec gnome-session"</span> <span class="token operator">
&gt;&gt;</span> <span class="token operator">~</span><span class="token operator">/</span><span class="token punctuation">.</span>xinitrc<span aria-hidden="true" class="line-numbers-rows"><span></span></span></code></pre></div></div><p>安装<span class="mod-overview__keyword">KDE</span>
或者MATE桌面环境的两个命令稍微不一样：</p><div class="rno-markdown-code"><div class="rno-markdown-code-toolbar"><div class="rno-markdown-code-toolbar-info"><div class="rno-markdown-code-toolbar-item is-type"><span class="is-m-hidden">代码语言：</span>javascript</div></div><div class="rno-markdown-code-toolbar-opt"><div 
class="rno-markdown-code-toolbar-copy"><i class="icon-copy"></i><span class="is-m-hidden">复制</span></div></div></div><div class="developer-code-block"><pre class="prism-token token line-numbers language-javascript" tabindex="0" style="font-family:Consolas,Monaco,&quot"><code 
class="language-javascript" style="margin-left:0"># kde
yum <span class="token operator">-</span>y groups install <span class="token string">"KDE Plasma Workspaces"</span>
echo <span class="token string">"exec startkde"</span> <span class="token operator">&gt;&gt;</span> <span class="token operator">~</span><span class="token operator">/</span><span class="token punctuation">.</span>xinitrc

# mate

yum <span class="token operator">--</span>enablerepo<span class="token operator">=</span>epel <span class="token operator">-</span>y groups install <span class="token string">"MATE Desktop"</span>
​echo <span class="token string">"exec /usr/bin/mate-session"</span> <span class="token operator">>></span> <span class="token operator">\~</span><span class="token operator">/</span><span class="token punctuation">.</span>xinitrc<span aria-hidden="true" class="line-numbers-rows"><span></span> <span></span><span></span><span></span><span></span><span></span><span></span></span></code></pre></div></div><p>以上便安装好了GUI桌面环境。</p><p>启动桌面环境有两种方式：</p><ol class="ol-level-0"><li>一次性的：在终端里输入startx；</li><li>系统启动时默认进入桌面环境： systemctl set-default graphical.target，然后重启；</li></ol><p><strong>安装vnc-server </strong></p><p>有了桌面环境，一般可以通过云<a class="rno-markdown__textlink-new" href="https://cloud.tencent.com/act/pro/promotion-cvm?from_column=20065&amp;from=20065" target="_blank" style="color:#0052d9">服务器</a>厂商提供的web终端远程连接进入桌面。用web终端每次都需要打开浏览器，然后登陆<span class="mod-overview__keyword">云管理</span>
后台再连接，比较麻烦。我们采取直接从桌面客户端远程连接的方式，省去打开浏览器和登录云管理后台的操作。</p><p>远程桌面技术有多种，例如VNC, TeamViewer, RDP等，本文使用免费且广泛使用的VNC。</p><p>在服务器上先安装服务端(tigervnc是tightvnc的分支)：</p><div class="rno-markdown-code"><div class="rno-markdown-code-toolbar"><div class="rno-markdown-code-toolbar-info"><div 
class="rno-markdown-code-toolbar-item is-type"><span class="is-m-hidden">代码语言：</span>javascript</div></div><div class="rno-markdown-code-toolbar-opt"><div class="rno-markdown-code-toolbar-copy"><i class="icon-copy"></i><span class="is-m-hidden">复制</span></div></div></div><div 
class="developer-code-block"><pre class="prism-token token line-numbers language-javascript" tabindex="0" style="font-family:Consolas,Monaco,&quot"><code class="language-javascript" style="margin-left:0">yum install <span class="token operator">-</span>y tigervnc<span class="token operator">-</span>
server<span aria-hidden="true" class="line-numbers-rows"><span></span></span></code></pre></div></div><p>接着复制一份VNC配置：</p><div class="rno-markdown-code"><div class="rno-markdown-code-toolbar"><div class="rno-markdown-code-toolbar-info"><div class="rno-markdown-code-toolbar-item is-type"><span 
class="is-m-hidden">代码语言：</span>javascript</div></div><div class="rno-markdown-code-toolbar-opt"><div class="rno-markdown-code-toolbar-copy"><i class="icon-copy"></i><span class="is-m-hidden">复制</span></div></div></div><div class="developer-code-block"><pre 
class="prism-token token line-numbers language-javascript" tabindex="0" style="font-family:Consolas,Monaco,&quot"><code class="language-javascript" style="margin-left:0">cp <span class="token operator">/</span>lib<span class="token operator">/</span>systemd<span class="token operator">/</span>system <span class="token operator">/</span>vncserver@<span class="token punctuation">.</span>service <span class="token operator">/</span>etc<span class="token operator">/</span>systemd<span class="token operator">/</span>system<span class="token operator">/</span>vncserver@<span class="token operator">: </span><span class="token number">1</span><span class="token punctuation">.</span>service<span aria-hidden="true" class="line-numbers-rows"><span></span></span></code></pre></div></div><p>注意上述命令参数重的“@:1”，可以将<code>数字1换成30000内的任意数字</code>，“5900+数字”即为程序的显示（监听）端口，如”@:1″表示监听5901端口。</p><p>
编辑该配置文件，将文件内的\<USER>替换成远程连接时的登录用户名（如果是root，注意将第二个\<USER>所在行的”/home”移除掉）。以root身份的配置示例：</p><div class="rno-markdown-code"><div class="rno-markdown-code-toolbar"><div class="rno-markdown-code-toolbar-info"><div class="rno-markdown-code-toolbar-item is-type"><span class="is-m-hidden">代码语言： </span>javascript</div></div><div class="rno-markdown-code-toolbar-opt"><div class="rno-markdown-code-toolbar-copy"><i class="icon-copy"></i><span class="is-m-hidden">复制</span></div></div></div><div class="developer-code-block"><pre class="prism-token token line-numbers language-javascript" 
tabindex="0" style="font-family:Consolas,Monaco,&quot"><code class="language-javascript" style="margin-left:0"># The vncserver service unit file

#

# Quick HowTo<span class="token operator">:</span>

# <span class="token number">1.</span> Copy <span class="token keyword">this</span> file to <span class="token operator">/</span>etc<span class="token operator">/</span>systemd<span class="token operator">/</span>system<span class="token operator">/</span>vncserver@<span class="token punctuation">.

</span>service

# <span class="token number">2.</span> Replace <span class="token operator"><</span><span class="token constant">USER</span><span class="token operator">></span> <span class="token keyword">with</span> the actual user name and edit vncserver

# parameters appropriately

# <span class="token punctuation">(</span>ExecStart<span class="token operator">=</span><span class="token operator">/</span>usr<span class="token operator">/</span>sbin<span class="token operator">/</span>runuser <span class="token operator">-</span>l <span class="token operator"><</span>\<span

class="token constant">USER</span><span class="token operator">></span> <span class="token operator">-</span>c <span class="token string">"/usr/bin/vncserver %i"</span>

# PIDFile<span class="token operator">=</span><span class="token operator">/</span>home<span class="token operator">/</span><span class="token operator"><</span><span class="token constant">USER</span><span class="token operator">></span><span class="token operator">/</span>\<span

class="token punctuation">.</span>vnc<span class="token operator">/</span><span class="token operator">%</span><span class="token constant">H</span><span class="token operator">%</span>i<span class="token punctuation">.</span>pid<span class="token punctuation">)</span>

# <span class="token number">3.</span> Run <span class="token template-string"><span class="token template-punctuation string">`</span><span class="token string">systemctl daemon-reload</span><span class="token template-punctuation string">`</span></span>

# <span class="token number">4.</span> Run <span class="token template-string"><span class="token template-punctuation string">`</span><span class="token string">systemctl enable vncserver@:&lt;display&gt;.service</span><span class="token template-punctuation string">`</span></span>

#

# <span class="token constant">DO</span> <span class="token constant">NOT</span> <span class="token constant">RUN</span> <span class="token constant">THIS</span> <span class="token constant">SERVICE</span> <span class="token keyword">if</span> your local area network is

# untrusted<span class="token operator">!</span> For a secure way <span class="token keyword">of</span> using <span class="token constant">VNC</span><span class="token punctuation">,</span> you should

# limit connections to the local host and then tunnel from

# the machine you want to view <span class="token constant">VNC</span> <span class="token function">on</span> <span class="token punctuation">(</span>host <span class="token constant">A</span><span class="token punctuation">)</span> to the machine

# whose <span class="token constant">VNC</span> output you want to <span class="token function">view</span> <span class="token punctuation">(</span>host <span class="token constant">B</span><span class="token punctuation">)</span>

#

# <span class="token punctuation">\[</span>user\@hostA <span class="token operator">\~</span><span class="token punctuation">]</span>$ ssh <span class="token operator">-</span>v <span class="token operator">-</span><span class="token constant">C</span> <span class="token operator">-</span>\<span

class="token constant">L</span> 590N<span class="token operator">:</span>localhost<span class="token operator">:</span>590M hostB

#

# <span class="token keyword">this</span> will open a connection on port 590N <span class="token keyword">of</span> your hostA to hostB's port 590M

# <span class="token punctuation">(</span><span class="token keyword">in</span> fact<span class="token punctuation">,</span> it ssh<span class="token operator">-</span>connects to hostB and then connects to <span class="token function">localhost</span> <span class="token punctuation">(</span>

on hostB<span class="token punctuation">)</span><span class="token punctuation">.</span>

# See the ssh man page <span class="token keyword">for</span> details on port forwarding<span class="token punctuation">)</span>

#

# You can then point a <span class="token constant">VNC</span> client on hostA at vncdisplay <span class="token constant">N</span> <span class="token keyword">of</span> localhost and <span class="token keyword">with</span>

# the help <span class="token keyword">of</span> ssh<span class="token punctuation">,</span> you end up seeing what hostB makes available on port 590M

#

# Use <span class="token string">"-nolisten tcp"</span> to prevent <span class="token constant">X</span> connections to your <span class="token constant">VNC</span> server via <span class="token constant">TCP</span><span class="token punctuation">.</span>

#

# Use <span class="token string">"-localhost"</span> to prevent remote <span class="token constant">VNC</span> clients connecting except when

# doing so through a secure tunnel<span class="token punctuation">.</span> See the <span class="token string">"-via"</span> option <span class="token keyword">in</span> the

# \`man vncviewer' manual page<span class="token punctuation">.</span>

<span class="token punctuation">\[</span>Unit<span class="token punctuation">]</span>
Description<span class="token operator">=</span>Remote desktop <span class="token function">service</span> <span class="token punctuation">(</span><span class="token constant">VNC</span><span class="token punctuation">)</span>
After<span class="token operator">=</span>syslog<span class="token punctuation">.</span>target network<span class="token punctuation">.</span>target

<span class="token punctuation">\[</span>Service<span class="token punctuation">]</span>
Type<span class="token operator">=</span>forking

# Clean any existing files <span class="token keyword">in</span> <span class="token operator">/</span>tmp<span class="token operator">/</span><span class="token punctuation">.</span><span class="token constant">X11</span><span class="token operator">-</span>unix environment

ExecStartPre<span class="token operator">=</span><span class="token operator">/</span>bin<span class="token operator">/</span>sh <span class="token operator">-</span>c <span class="token string">'/usr/bin/vncserver -kill %i > /dev/null 2>&1 || :'</span>
ExecStart<span class="token operator">=</span><span class="token operator">/</span>usr<span class="token operator">/</span>sbin<span class="token operator">/</span>runuser <span class="token operator">-</span>l root <span class="token operator">-</span>c <span class="token string">
"/usr/bin/vncserver %i"</span>
PIDFile<span class="token operator">=</span><span class="token regex"><span class="token regex-delimiter">/</span><span class="token regex-source language-regex">root</span><span class="token regex-delimiter">/</span></span><span class="token punctuation">.</span>vnc<span class="token operator">/ </span><span class="token operator">%</span><span class="token constant">H</span><span class="token operator">%</span>i<span class="token punctuation">.</span>pid
ExecStop<span class="token operator">=</span><span class="token operator">/</span>bin<span class="token operator">/</span>sh <span class="token operator">-</span>c <span class="token string">'/usr/bin/vncserver -kill %i > /dev/null 2>&1 || :'</span>

<span class="token punctuation">\[</span>Install<span class="token punctuation">]</span>
WantedBy<span class="token operator">=</span>multi<span class="token operator">-</span>user<span class="token punctuation">.</span>target<span aria-hidden="true" class="line-numbers-rows"><span></span><span></span><span></span><span></span><span></span><span></span><span></span><span></span><span> </span><span></span><span></span><span></span><span></span><span></span><span></span><span></span><span></span><span></span><span></span><span></span><span></span><span></span><span></span><span></span><span></span><span></span><span></span><span></span><span></span><span></span><span></span><span> </span><span></span><span></span><span></span><span></span><span></span><span></span><span></span><span></span><span></span><span></span><span></span><span></span><span></span><span></span><span></span><span></span></span></code></pre></div></div><p>接下来设置vnc连接密码：</p><p><code>vncpasswd</code></p><p>
注意连接密码与登录密码不同：连接密码用于显示远程桌面，登录密码用于用户登录系统。</p><p>设置好后，启动vnc服务：</p><div class="rno-markdown-code"><div class="rno-markdown-code-toolbar"><div class="rno-markdown-code-toolbar-info"><div class="rno-markdown-code-toolbar-item is-type"><span class="is-m-hidden">代码语言：</span>javascript</div></div><div 
class="rno-markdown-code-toolbar-opt"><div class="rno-markdown-code-toolbar-copy"><i class="icon-copy"></i><span class="is-m-hidden">复制</span></div></div></div><div class="developer-code-block"><pre class="prism-token token line-numbers language-javascript" tabindex="0" 
style="font-family:Consolas,Monaco,&quot"><code class="language-javascript" style="margin-left:0">systemctl daemon<span class="token operator">-</span>reload
systemctl start vncserver@<span class="token operator">:</span><span class="token number">1</span>
systemctl enable vncserver@<span class="token operator">:</span><span class="token number">1</span><span aria-hidden="true" class="line-numbers-rows"><span></span><span></span><span></span></span></code></pre></div></div><p>如果开启了<span class="mod-overview__keyword">防火墙</span>，注意放行相应端口。</p><p><strong>
客户端连接</strong></p><p>服务端配置完毕，接下来用客户端连接。</p><p>vnc是免费技术，许多客户端都支持该协议。本文采用App Store上免费的“Remote Desktop – VNC”软件进行连接，打开后软件界面如下：</p><figure class=""><div class="rno-markdown-img-url" style="text-align:center"><div class="rno-markdown-img-url-inner" style="width:45.03%"><div style="width:100%"><img 
src=":/803574d9a7f24813888355759c9ba5c2"></div></div></div></figure><p>在输入框填写服务器地址：vnc://ip:port，其中ip是服务器的ip或<a class="rno-markdown__textlink-new" href="https://cloud.tencent.com/act/pro/domain-sales?from_column=20065&amp;from=20065" target="_blank" 
style="color:#0052d9">域名</a>，port是监听的端口，例如5901。输入后按回车，弹出密码输入框，输入vncpasswd设置的密码。密码正确的话就可以看到服务器的图形桌面，例如：</p><figure class=""><div class="rno-markdown-img-url" style="text-align:center"><div class="rno-markdown-img-url-inner" style="width:100%"><div style="width:100%"><img 
src=":/e91760e2a36f4c03963d2b66f069664a"></div></div></div></figure><p>按回车键进入登录界面，输入登录用户名和密码进入系统：</p><figure class=""><div class="rno-markdown-img-url" style="text-align:center"><div class="rno-markdown-img-url-inner" style="width:100%"><div style="width:100%"><img 
src=":/77aab9b67395435da512a0b65a5e4f02"></div></div></div></figure><p>接下来就可以做各种图形操作了。</p><p><strong>参考</strong></p><p>How to install a GUI on top of <span class="mod-overview__keyword">CentOS</span> 7 How to Install and Configure VNC Server in CentOS 7</p><p>
以上就是本文的全部内容，希望对大家的学习有所帮助。</p></div></div></div><div class="mod-content__source"><div class="mod-content__source-inner"><div class="mod-content__source-title">本文参与 <a href="https://cloud.tencent.com/developer/support-plan" target="_blank">腾讯云自媒体同步曝光计划</a>，分享自作者个人站点/博客。</div><div class="mod-content__source-desc">
